title: It wasn't easy
creator_credit: Nico Crama, Arthur Hammond, Nederlandse Omroep Stichting and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Half a million people of Dutch origin live in Canada. This film looks at the unique character of the Dutch Canadians, their reasons for leaving the Netherlands and their contribution to Canadian society and culture. A cross section of Dutch Canadians living across Canada are interviewed.
creator_credit_for_label: Nico Crama, Arthur Hammond, Nederlandse Omroep Stichting and National Film Board of Canada
